summary: Backend API testing for AI News Monitoring Agent. All 21 tests passed covering root, auth, status, runs, history, articles, trigger, telegram webhook, and agent stats endpoints.
critical_code_review_comments: HuggingFace LLM is MOCKED — rule-based fallback used (HF_TOKEN empty). Validation quality depends on rule-based scoring only.
MongoDB _id excluded correctly via {'_id': 0} projections in all GET endpoints
Telegram webhook silently ignores unknown chat IDs — correct security behavior
seed_data_creation: Triggered one new agent run during testing (background task, may still be running)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend endpoints working. 21/21 tests pass. Agent previously ran once (run_id: 40212449-294e-4a7b-8f86-efd312f39fcd) — 115 articles fetched, 50 validated, 15-item digest built. HuggingFace LLM is MOCKED (rule-based fallback). Frontend testing was not requested.
